short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promotify takes a pre-formatted Taiga issue and creates a new user story.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using a pre-formatted Taiga issue, Promotify  collects information from the issue and makes a new user story. In particular it takes a list of tasks that are formatted in the issue description and creates a user story that has the tasks listed in the issue as new sub-tasks. This is done by clicking the Promotify icon which will create a button on the Taiga issue page. Clicking the new Promotify button will create the new user story.
